H0.text: A craniotomy is the surgical removal of a portion of which part of the human body. Brain

H1.text: A craniotomy is the surgical removal of a portion of which part of the human body. Face

H2.text: A craniotomy is the surgical removal of a portion of which part of the human body. Scalp

H3.text: A craniotomy is the surgical removal of a portion of which part of the human body. Skull

A4.text: A craniotomy is a surgical operation in which a bone flap is temporarily removed from the skull
